description: Your lay on hands ability adds an additional mercy.

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Lay on hands class feature, mercy class feature.

sections.text: Select one additional mercy for which you qualify. When you use lay on hands to heal damage to one target, it also receives the additional effects of this mercy.
sections.name: Benefits

sections.text: You can gain this feat multiple times. Its effects do not stack. Each time you take this feat, select a new mercy.
sections.name: Special

name: Extra Mercy
